short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Non-custodial CEX on-ramp for dApp users

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tensfer is a non-custodial browser extension that allows you to connect your different Centralized Exchanges, to track & transfer with any dApp.

Why you should use Tensfer?

üîí Secure Credentials: All your information is encrypted and stored locally on your computer.

‚ú® Seamless dApp Connection: Experience DeFi wallet features when you connect to dApps through Tensfer.

üîç Seamless Integration: Seamlessly link your choice dApps with your CEX accounts, wallets, simplifying the management of funds across both CeFi and DeFi ecosystems.

üõ°Ô∏è Security You Can Trust
Your Private keys, password, and sensitive data remain 100% private‚Äîaccessible only to you.

Main Features:

‚úÖ  View your balances and transaction history
‚úÖ  Monitor your portfolio across CEX's, and self custody wallets
‚úÖ  One-click asset transfers, including deposits and withdrawals
‚úÖ  See and review past transactions
‚úÖ  Access liquidity from CEX while using your favourite dApps
